Dgame.Audio.Sound



enum Status;
Represents the current status.

Stopped
Sound is stopped

Paused
Sound is paused

Playing
Sound is playing

None
No information

enum ChannelType;
The channel type. Mono or Stereo.

Mono
Channel type is Mono

Stereo
Channel type is Stereo

struct Channel;
Channel struct which stores the channel information.

ubyte bits;
How many bits has this channel

ChannelType type;
Which type is this channel

this(ubyte bits, ChannelType type);
CTor

ref Channel opCall(ubyte bits, ChannelType type);
Short set function.

Example:
 Channel ch;
 ch(8, ChannelType.Stereo); // set bits and type for this channel.


class Sound;
Sound represents the functionality to manipulate loaded sounds. That means with this class you can get informations about the sound or you can play, stop or pause it.

Author:
rschuett

this();
CTor

this(BaseSoundFile soundfile);
CTor

this(string filename);
CTor

void free();
Free / Release the source and buffer of the Sound

static Sound loadOnce(BaseSoundFile soundfile);
Load a soundfile and stores the sound object in a static field. Then returns the sound object. If you try to load the same file on more time, you get the same sound object as before.

void loadFromFile(BaseSoundFile soundfile);
Load from a soundfile.

Example:
 Sound s1 = new Sound();
 s1.loadFromFile(new VorbisFile("samples/audio/orchestral.ogg"));


See:
BaseSoundFile

See:
VorbisFile

See:
WaveFile

BaseSoundFile loadFromFile(string filename);
Load a soundfile from his path.

Example:
 Sound s1 = new Sound();
 if (s1.loadFromFile("samples/audio/orchestral.ogg") is null)
	throw new Exception("Could not load file.");


See:
BaseSoundFile

See:

void loadFromMemory(const void* buffer, uint dataSize, uint frequency, ref const Channel ch);
Load from memory.

ref BaseSoundFile getSoundFile();
Returns the soundfile.

const pure nothrow ALenum getFormat();

void setVolume(float volume);
Set the volume.

void setVolume(ubyte volume);
Set the volume.

const pure nothrow ubyte getVolume();

void setLooping(bool enable);
Enable looping.

const pure nothrow bool getLooping();
Returns if the looping is enabled or not.

void play(bool enable);
Activate the playing. If enable is true, the looping is also activated.

void play();
Activate the playing.

void stop();
Stop current playing.

void rewind();
Rewind playing.

void pause();
Pause playing.

void setPosition(const vec3f pos);
Set the position.

void setPosition(float x, float y, float z = 0);
Set the position.

void setVelocity(float x, float y, float z = 0);
